name: What a Long, Strange Trip It's Been

strategy.title: Year-Long Planning
steps: This meta-achievement requires completing all major holiday achievements
Start tracking during Lunar Festival (late January/February)
Mark your calendar for each holiday event
Noblegarden and Children's Week are often the most time-sensitive
Some achievements require PvP (School of Hard Knocks) - prepare accordingly

strategy.title: Holiday Order
steps: Love is in the Air (Feb): Fool For Love
Hallow's End (Oct): Hallowed Be Thy Name
